oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lincoln and Johnson 1864 campaign button
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Abraham Lincoln and Andrew Johnson 1864 campaign button for President and Vice-President. (Circular tin-type, embossed, with red ribbon fragment). 1 button (1 inch diameter) - image on both sides. From the estate of Margaret Patterson family, Andrew Johnson’s daughter.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Political campaigns; Artifacts; Portraits; Politicians;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
